xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
Class ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.functions.AbstractFunction<java.lang.Number,java.lang.Double>
      xxl.core.math.functions.AbstractRealFunctionFunction
          xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.AbstractKernelDensityEstimator
              xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Function<java.lang.Number,java.lang.Double>, RealFunction
public class ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator
extends AbstractKernelDensityEstimator

This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based pdf estimator AbstractKernelDensityEstimator that uses reflection for avoiding boundary effects. Additionally, this class provides a FACTORY for generating reflection kernel based density estimators.

See Also:
KernelFunction, KernelBandwidths, AbstractRealFunctionFunction, AbstractKernelDensityEstimator, NativeKernelDensityEstimator, Serialized Form

Field Detail

FACTORY

public static Function FACTORY
Provides a factory for a reflection based kernel density estimator , i.e., an estimator using reflection for boundary treatment. The parameters needed for construction are passed to the factory by an Object[] o containing:
o[0]: used kernel function
o[1]: used sample as Object[] containing numerical data
o[2]: used bandwidth as Object of type Number
o[3]: confidence level as Object of type Number
o[4]: minimum of the data space as Object of type Number
o[5]: maximum of the data space as Object of type Number

min

protected double min
minimum of the data (estimated or computed)

max

protected double max
maximum of the data (estimated or computed)

Constructor Detail

ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator

public ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator(KernelFunction kf,
                                        java.lang.Object[] sample,
                                        double h,
                                        double min,
                                        double max,
                                        double alpha)
Constructs an estimator for a density function using the given kernel function. This class implements a special kind of a kernel density estimator, meaning reflection is used as boundary treatment.

Parameters:
kf - used Kernel function.
sample - sample of a data set given as Object[] containing objects of type Number
h - used bandwidth for computing the estimation
min - left border of the data space
max - right border of the data space
alpha - confidence level used for computing an asymptotic pointwise confidence interval

ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator

public ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator(KernelFunction kf,
                                        java.lang.Object[] sample,
                                        double h,
                                        double min,
                                        double max)
Constructs an estimator for a density function using the given kernel function. This class implements a special kind of a kernel density estimator, meaning reflection is used as boundary treatment.

Parameters:
kf - used Kernel function.
sample - sample of a data set given as Object[] containing objects of type Number
h - used bandwidth for computing the estimation
min - left border of the data space
max - right border of the data space

newMax - new upper border
